1.pT: Chûgoku kara kita aitsu! Chotto hen!!

2.pT: Asobi janai no yo gakkô wa

3.pT: Ikinari ai no arashi chotto matte yo

4.pT: Ranma to Ranma? Gokai ga tomaranai

5.pT: Hone made aishite? Akane koi no fukuzatsu kossetsu

6.pT: Akane no shitsuren datte shôganai janai

8.pT: Gakkô wa senjôda! Taiketsu Ranma VS Ryôga

9.pT: Otome hakusho: Kami wa on'na no inochinano

10.pT: Pî pî P-chan rokuna monja nê

11.pT: Ranma o gekiai! Shintaisou no sukeban toujou

12.pT: Onna no koi wa snesouyo! Kakutou shintaisou de iza shoubu

13.pT: Sukeban no me ni namida? Rûru muyou no kakutou shintaisou kecchaku

14.pT: Kotsuban uranai! Ranma wa nihonichi no oyomesan

15.pT: Gekiretsu shoujo Shanpû toujou! Watashi inochi azukemasu

16.pT: Shanpû no hangeki! Hissatsu shiatsuken wa mimo kokomo ubau

18.pT: Ore wa otokoda! Ranma chuugoku ni kaeru?
